chapter.title: Univention Management Console (UMC) Management Console Univention Management ConsoleManagement Console UMCManagement Console
chapter.para: The Univention Management Console (UMC) is the web-based management application provided by UCS.

section.title: UMC files Management ConsoleFiles
section.para: Files for building a UMC module.
dh-umc-module-build builds translation files. dh-umc-module-install installs files. Configured through debian/package.umc-modules.
section.programlisting: Module: module-name Python: umc Definition: umc/module-name.xml Javascript: umc Icons: umc/icons

listitem.para: Directory containing the Python code relative to top-level directory. PMH: Bug #31151
Path to an XML file, which describes the module. See for more information.
Directory containing the Java-Script code relative to top-level directory. PMH: Bug #31151
Directory containing the Icons relative to top-level directory. Must provide icons in sizes 16×16 (umc/icons/16x16/udm-module.png) and 50×50 (umc/icons/50x50/udm-module.png) pixels.

section.title: Local System Module Management ConsoleModuleSystem
section.para: Use umc-create-module to template for custom module.

section.title: Domain LDAP Module Management ConsoleModuleLDAP
section.programlisting: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <umc version="2.0"> <module id="udm" icon="udm-MODULE" version="1.0" translationId="MODULE"> <flavor priority="25" icon="udm-MODULE-SUBMODULE" id="MODULE/SUBMODULE"> <name>MODULE name</name> <description>MODULE description</description> </flavor> <categories> <category name="domain"/> </categories> </module> </umc>
section.para: Must use /umc/module/category/@name="domain"! Must use /umc/module/@translationId to specify alternative translation file, which must be installed as /usr/share/univention-management-console/i18n/language/module.mo.

section.title: Disabling a Module Management ConsoleModuleDisable
section.para: To disabling a module use the following XML file as a template:
section.programlisting: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <umc version="2.0"> <module id="udm" icon="udm/module" version="1.0" translationId="MODULE"> <name/> <description/> <flavor id="MODULE/SUBMODULE" deactivated="yes" /> </module> </umc>
